title: Research & Data Science Excellence
text: At Delta Solutions, we bring together advanced data science expertise with deep research experience across medical and biological domains. Our consultancy is built on collaborations with world-leading institutions including UCL, Imperial College London, Oxford University, Cambridge, and the John Innes Centre. We specialize in securing government funding and managing sensitive data for the NHS and other prestigious organizations. Our comprehensive training and consultancy services are designed to help organizations leverage data science and statistical methodologies effectively while maintaining the highest standards of data security and research integrity.
